heading: # Progress circular
headingText: The `v-progress-circular` component is used to convey data circularly to users. It also can be put into an indeterminate state to portray loading.

usage.desc: By default, progress circular uses the applications secondary color.

circular-colored.heading: ### Colored
circular-colored.desc: Alternate colors can be applied to `v-progress-circular` using the `color` prop.

circular-indeterminate.heading: ### Indeterminate
circular-indeterminate.desc: Using the `indeterminate` prop, a `v-progress-circular` continues to animate indefinitely.

circular-size-and-width.heading: ### Size & Width
circular-size-and-width.desc: The `size` and `width` props allow you to easily alter the size and width of the `v-progress-circular` component.

circular-rotate.heading: ### Rotate
circular-rotate.desc: The `rotate` prop gives you the ability to customize the `v-progress-circular`'s origin.

props.active: Reduce the height to 0, hiding component
props.backgroundColor: Background color, set to component's color if null
props.backgroundOpacity: Background opacity, if null it defaults to 0.3 if background color is not specified or 1 otherwise
props.bufferValue: The percentage value for the buffer
props.fill: Sets the fill color of the circle
props.indeterminate: Constantly animates, use when loading progress is unknown.
props.rotate: Rotates the circle start point in deg
props.size: Sets the diameter of the circle in pixels
props.value: The percentage value for current progress
props.width: Sets the stroke of the circle in pixels
